sentence.Network_cn: 首先, 将自己的船升到第15级, 然后拓殖行星.

sentence.Network_en: It will not infect or colonize dead or dried plant tissue.
sentence.Network_cn: 它不会传染或寄居于死的或干的植体组织.

entry.tran: 在…开拓殖民地;将…建成殖民地
entry.def: If people colonize a foreign country, they go to live there and take control of it.

example.ex: The first British attempt to colonize Ireland was in the twelfth century...
example.tran: 英国最早尝试在爱尔兰开拓殖民地是在12世纪。

example.ex: Liberia was never colonised by the European powers...
example.tran: 利比里亚从未沦落为欧洲强国的殖民地。

entry.def: When large numbers of animals colonize a place, they go to live there and make it their home.

example.ex: Toads are colonising the whole place.
example.tran: 蟾蜍把这整个地方都占为己有。

entry.def: When an area is colonized by a type of plant, the plant grows there in large amounts.

example.ex: The area was then colonized by scrub.

means.word_mean: 1. settle as a colony; of countries in the developing world;
2. settle as colonists or establish a colony (in);
